Posts.Content: Good morning, My best friend is planning to have a double Mastectomy after her BC treatlment. They say they can not save the nipple. Would anyone be kind enought to share their personal experience that I can relay to her? She asked me to gather information so she can make the correct decision. Also, does anyone have the tattoos?  Thank you in advance. 0 likes, 4 replies Report
Posts.Title: Breast Reconstruction after Mastectomy-Suggestions

Posts.Content: HI, Check out the website breastcancer.org there is so much info there for you...Good Luck! Report
Posts.Title: Breast Reconstruction after Mastectomy-Suggestions

Posts.Content: Thank you VERYmuch for sharing your story. You are very brave and I admire you. I will pass along this very helpful information. Thank you again ! Report
Posts.Title: Breast Reconstruction after Mastectomy-Suggestions

Posts.Content: Good morning ladies. My best friend is going through this ordeal of BC, you all are very brave and I admire you very much. Would any of you have any suggestions about how you manage mouth sores?  Thank you very much.   0 likes, 9 replies Report
Posts.Title: BC Chemo - Mouth Sores, any suggestions?

Posts.Content: Oh my gosh! Pamela, that's awful! I'm sorry that must have been awful. I have had thrush in mouth from Diabetic onset, but nothing like that. Thank you very much for the reply, I will pass along your advice. I wish you well. Report
Posts.Title: BC Chemo - Mouth Sores, any suggestions?
BC Chemo - Mouth Sores, any suggestions?

Posts.Content: I am SO glad you are all clear as of Christmas. I truly admire your strength to go through that process.  Report
Posts.Title: BC Chemo - Mouth Sores, any suggestions?

Posts.Content: I had very bad thrush and mouth ulcers so much so I ended up in hospital and I was advised to use Daktarin constant helped Report
